COMMENT_TX: $this game was postponed on the previous day due to snow and cold weather; the game started 2 hours late because a crew had to shovel out the stadium, including the dugouts
Mets left fielder Lucas Duda left the game due to an injured back
Rockies pitcher Jhoulys Chacin left the game due to an injured side

ej,rossc001,P,fairc901,Called third strike ej,gibsk001,M,fairc901,Called third strike $Cody Ross threw his bat after the called third strike; when he threw his helmet, he was ejected by HP umpire Chad Fairchild; Ross started yelling at Fairchild and Diamondbakcs manager Kirk Gibson ran out and grabbed Ross; Gibson restrained Ross until Diamondbacks 3B coach Matt Williams ran down the line and took Ross to the dugout; Gibson then argued with and was ejected by Fairchild
Rockies center fielder Dexter Fowler left the game due to an injured hip
$originally scored as single, changed to E6 on 5-09-2013, removing RBI and making all 5 runs in inning unearned
originally scored as stolen base, changed to CS2 with error on 5-09-2013, making run unearned
$Rafael Betancourt left with groin injury after second pitch

replay,6,fowld001,COL,demud901,DEN02,F,N,I,,H $Dexter Fowler hit a fly ball down the RF line on the first pitch of the inning; the ball struck inches to the foul side of the white vertical stripe on the padded wall and was ruled a foul ball; Rockies manager Walt Weiss talked to the umpires, who huddled; crew chief Dana DeMuth watched the replay and upheld the call
Carl Crawford left with a left hamstring cramp

ej,mattd001,M,knigb901,Catch/no catch call $Zack Greinke caught the ball on a short hop which was ruled no catch by HP umpire Gerry Davis; the umpires huddled after the play and upheld the ruling; Dodgers Manager Don Mattingly ejected by 1B umpire Brian Knight
$Carlos Gonzalez struck on the foot by a foul ball while in on deck area and left game with a bruised foot
Dexter Fowler left with a swollen knuckle on his right ring finger
$called by 2B umpire Bob Davidson
$called by 3B umpire Jim Reynolds; Wilton Lopez called for two balks during the same at bat

ej,lopew001,P,hirsj901,Balk call ej,wrigj101,C,reynj901,Balk call (Made 'crazy' signal) $Wilton Lopez yelled at 1B umpire John Hirschbeck after making the putout at 1B and was ejected by Hirschbeck; Lopez was upset with the two balks; between innings, Rockies pitching coach Jim Wright stood on the dugout steps and made a circular motion with his index finger by his ear - the 'crazy' signal; he was ejected by 3B umpire Jim Reynolds
Troy Tulowitzki left with a broken rib, suffered on a diving stop
